TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Bsuring, title = Bsuring, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bsuring} }

S.FORM: Bsuring Itiniay i Xiulin Cen no Hualien ko Bsuring a niyaro', 321 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 1,054 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 1,008 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 46 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Truku 82%, Tayal 3%, Amis 3%, Bunun 1%, Seediq1%, roma 5%.

Bsoring Itiniay i Xiolin Cen no Hoalien ko Bsoring a niyaro', 321 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 1,054 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 1,008 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 46 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Troko 82%, Tayal 3%, Amis 3%, Bonon 1%, Seediq1%, roma 5%.
